title: 1906 Copa del Rey
text:
The Copa del Rey 1906 was the 4th staging of the <a href="Copa%20del%20Rey">Copa del Rey</a>, the <a href="Spain">Spanish</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> cup competition.
The competition started on April 9, 1906, and concluded on April 11, 1906, with the last group stage match, in which <a href="Real%20Madrid">Madrid FC</a> lifted the trophy for the second time ever with 2 victories over <a href="Recreativo%20de%20Huelva">Recreativo de Huelva</a> and <a href="Athletic%20de%20Bilbao">Athletic de Bilbao</a>. The three teams entered the tournament played playing all against all in three games. The <a href="RCD%20Espanyol">X Sporting Club</a>, <a href="Catalan%20football%20championship">Catalonia championship</a> did not want to travel to <a href="Madrid">Madrid</a> to play the tournament for economical and internal reasons.
Almost all of the <a href="Recreativo%20de%20Huelva">Recreativo de Huelva</a> team players were English.
